summary: Diff adds Linux/Raspberry Pi bundle packaging and runtime scripts plus GPIO event runner env/service examples and docs, but the provided excerpts are truncated and do not conclusively show that the bundle contents/launcher behaviors meet all acceptance criteria. Diff also includes substantial unrelated frontend control-panel feature changes not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Packaging workflow produces a self-contained .tar.gz bundle including frontend build output, backend canister artifacts, launcher script, and Raspberry Pi helper scripts.
missing_requirements.reason: A packaging script was added/modified, but the diff excerpt is truncated before showing the steps that copy frontend build output, include backend canister artifacts (WASM/candid), include the launcher/helper scripts, and actually create the final .tar.gz archive.

missing_requirements.requirement: From extracted bundle, single launcher command starts/reuses local replica, installs backend canister from bundled WASM, and prints backend canister ID and example URLs/commands; supports explicit stop and clean actions with help text.
missing_requirements.reason: The launcher script shows implemented --stop/--clean/--help handling, but the excerpt is truncated before demonstrating the 'start' path: starting/reusing replica, installing from bundled WASM, and printing canister ID + example URLs/commands.

missing_requirements.requirement: Bundle documentation explains how to run the Raspberry Pi event runner with CANISTER_ID + network selection, DRY_RUN mode, and lists required Linux packages/tools and installation guidance.
missing_requirements.reason: Docs were modified/added but the provided content is truncated right after headings/intro sections, so the required runnable commands and package installation instructions cannot be verified from the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Bundle includes documented systemd unit example for event runner including where to set CANISTER_ID/NETWORK and how to enable/disable/start/stop; optional and doesnâ€™t break manual execution.
missing_requirements.reason: A systemd unit example file is added, but the documentation showing enable/disable/start/stop commands and configuration guidance is not visible in the truncated docs excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Large set of control-panel UI and behavior changes (edit/interact mode synchronization, fullscreen handling, new sections, selection/drag behavior changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on Linux/Raspberry Pi bundling, launcher, GPIO runner guidance, and systemd example; it does not request new control panel UI features.

hallucinated_features.description: New/changed control types and strict binary code validation plus dial increase/decrease codes, layout import/export validation changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by Raspberry Pi distribution requirements.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated) - entries for frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts, frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts, frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts, frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts

hallucinated_features.description: Backend signal emission changes and conversion of binary codes to decimal; recent signals polling interval changed (5s to 2s) and staleTime adjustments.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the bundling/launcher/GPIO-runner/systemd requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Button controls emitting gpioset command strings directly from the UI (press/release commands) and inspector changes to display/edit codes as decimal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks for distribution scripts and GPIO runner guidance, not a redesign of how UI emits GPIO commands.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/modification of project tracking metadata in project_state.json with new_feature_requests AR-1..AR-5 marked pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding/updating project management state files.
